resources.name: My Planner plans
resources.description: Lists up to 20 Planner plans you are a member of, including title, owner, and created date.

resources.name: My Planner tasks
resources.description: Lists up to 50 Planner tasks assigned to you, with details like title, due date, progress, plan, and assigned users.

resources.name: All accessible Planner plans
resources.description: Lists up to 20 Planner plans you have access to, including title, owner, and creation date.

resources.name: All accessible Planner tasks
resources.description: Shows up to 50 Planner tasks across all plans you have access to, including title, due date, progress, plan, and assigned users.

resources.name: My recent Planner plans
resources.description: Lists your 10 most recently accessed Planner plans with title, owner, and creation date.

resources.name: All accessible Planner buckets
resources.description: Lists up to 20 buckets (columns/stages) across Planner plans you have access to, with name and plan.
